metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Someone interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textName: AD08 Logs Of Cloud Application Stolen
metadata.ns:textReviewSolution: Avoid storing of sensitive data in logs; Apply logs encryption; Ensure strong encryption algorithms for logs;
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: Disclosure of sensitive information from cloud application logs
metadata.ns:textReference: R30, R.31 Lost or compromise of operational or security logs [ENISA]
